headline: Republic Services’s Q4 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: Republic Services delivered fourth-quarter results that were largely stable, though revenue growth was constrained by softer volumes, especially in construction and manufacturing end markets. The company pointed to strong pricing discipline and ongoing cost control as key factors offsetting these headwinds. CEO Jon Vander Ark highlighted that “average yield on total revenue was 3.7%” and underscored the role of digital tools in enhancing operational efficiency. Management acknowledged the challe
